SELECT u.email, u.nickname, u.booklog_name, u.booklog_image, u.booklog_intro, u.booklog_no, @rnum:=@rnum+1 FROM user u
LEFT OUTER JOIN () vc ON u.booklog_no = vc.target_no
LEFT OUTER JOIN bookmark b ON u.email = b.target_email
, (SELECT @rnum:=0) TMP
@rnum < 10
AND u.nickname LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND b.email = #{keyword}
ORDER BY vc.count DESC
